doc.title: Peace Jubilee Naval Parade, New York City
doc.plot: "A remarkably fine view of this wonderful pageant, taken from a very swift launch running by the battleships in the following order: 'New York,' 'Iowa,' 'Indiana,' 'Brooklyn,' 'Massachusetts,' 'Oregon,' and 'Texas.' The ships are all dressed in holiday attire, and the decks crowded with cheering men. The scene is inspiring from start to finish."
